languages.text: "Вольный Торговец не долж{mf|ен|на} отвечать за проступки предшественницы". {n}Поднимается ропот, но Соломон невозмутимо продолжает.{/n} "Или по той же логике следовало давным-давно судить Инцендию Чорду за то, что творила ее предшественница Аспис. Как видите, довольно легко вычленить несоответствия в обвинении, если немного поработать головой. Я отказываюсь быть бездумным инструментом и следовать абсурдным приказам".

"The Rogue Trader should not be held responsible for the misdeeds of {mf|his|her} predecessor." {n}Murmuring breaks out, but Solomorne presses on, unperturbed.{/n} "Or else, by that same logic, Incendia Chorda should have been tried long ago for what her predecessor Aspyce did. As you can see, it isn't difficult to find inconsistencies in a case if you use your head a little. I refuse to be a mindless tool and follow absurd orders."
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец не долж{mf|ен|на} отвечать за проступки предшественницы". {n}Поднимается ропот, но Соломон невозмутимо продолжает.{/n} "Или по той же логике следовало давным-давно судить Инцендию Чорду за то, что творила ее предшественница Аспис. Как видите, довольно легко вычленить несоответствия в обвинении, если немного поработать головой. Я отказываюсь быть бездумным инструментом и следовать абсурдным приказам".

As you can see, it isn't difficult to find inconsistencies in a case if you use your head a little. I refuse to be a mindless tool and follow absurd orders."

As you can see, it isn't difficult to find inconsistencies in a case if you use your head a little. I refuse to be a mindless tool and follow absurd orders."

As you can see, it isn't difficult to find inconsistencies in a case if you use your head a little. I refuse to be a mindless tool and follow absurd orders."

As you can see, it isn't difficult to find inconsistencies in a case if you use your head a little. I refuse to be a mindless tool and follow absurd orders."

As you can see, it isn't difficult to find inconsistencies in a case if you use your head a little. I refuse to be a mindless tool and follow absurd orders."

languages.text: "{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} sollte nicht für die Verbrechen {mf|seiner|ihrer} Vorgängerin verantwortlich gemacht werden." {n}Ein Raunen geht durch den Saal, aber Solomorne fährt unbeeindruckt fort.{/n} "Folgt man dieser Logik, hätte andernfalls auch Incendia Chorda längst für die Verbrechen ihres Vorgängers Aspyce vor Gericht stehen müssen. Wie Ihr sehen könnt, ist es nicht schwer, in einem Fall Ungereimtheiten zu finden, wenn man ein wenig nachdenkt. Ich weigere mich, ein hirnloses Werkzeug zu sein und absurde Befehle zu befolgen."
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader should not be held responsible for the misdeeds of {mf|his|her} predecessor." {n}Murmuring breaks out, but Solomorne presses on, unperturbed.{/n} "Or else, by that same logic, Incendia Chorda should have been tried long ago for what her predecessor Aspyce did. As you can see, it isn't difficult to find inconsistencies in a case if you use your head a little. I refuse to be a mindless tool and follow absurd orders."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} sollte nicht für die Verbrechen {mf|seiner|ihrer} Vorgängerin verantwortlich gemacht werden." {n}Ein Raunen geht durch den Saal, aber Solomorne fährt unbeeindruckt fort.{/n} "Folgt man dieser Logik, hätte andernfalls auch Incendia Chorda längst für die Verbrechen ihres Vorgängers Aspyce vor Gericht stehen müssen. Wie Ihr sehen könnt, ist es nicht schwer, in einem Fall Ungereimtheiten zu finden, wenn man ein wenig nachdenkt. Ich weigere mich, ein hirnloses Werkzeug zu sein und absurde Befehle zu befolgen."

languages.text: « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} ne doit pas être tenu pour responsable des crimes de sa prédécesseure. {n}Des murmures s'élèvent dans le public, mais Solomorne poursuit, imperturbable.{/n} Ou alors, suivant cette même logique, Incendia Chorda aurait dû être traduite en justice depuis longtemps pour les agissements d'Aspyce. Comme vous pouvez le constater, il n'est guère difficile de relever les incohérences d'un dossier, à condition de réfléchir un peu. Je refuse d'obéir aveuglément à des ordres insensés. »
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader should not be held responsible for the misdeeds of {mf|his|her} predecessor." {n}Murmuring breaks out, but Solomorne presses on, unperturbed.{/n} "Or else, by that same logic, Incendia Chorda should have been tried long ago for what her predecessor Aspyce did. As you can see, it isn't difficult to find inconsistencies in a case if you use your head a little. I refuse to be a mindless tool and follow absurd orders."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} ne doit pas être tenu pour responsable des crimes de sa prédécesseure. {n}Des murmures s'élèvent dans le public, mais Solomorne poursuit, imperturbable.{/n} Ou alors, suivant cette même logique, Incendia Chorda aurait dû être traduite en justice depuis longtemps pour les agissements d'Aspyce. Comme vous pouvez le constater, il n'est guère difficile de relever les incohérences d'un dossier, à condition de réfléchir un peu. Je refuse d'obéir aveuglément à des ordres insensés. »

languages.text: “行商浪人不该为前任行商浪人犯下的罪行负责。”{n}索罗蒙话音刚落，法庭中就爆发了阵阵窃窃私语，但索罗蒙不慌不忙，继续开了口。{/n}“否则，若是按照同样的逻辑，因森蒂娅·库尔达早就该为前任行商浪人阿斯拜丝的所作所为而接受审判了。正如你们所见，只要稍微动点脑子，就不难发现案件中的矛盾之处。我拒绝沦为没有头脑的工具，拒绝听从荒谬的命令。”
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader should not be held responsible for the misdeeds of {mf|his|her} predecessor." {n}Murmuring breaks out, but Solomorne presses on, unperturbed.{/n} "Or else, by that same logic, Incendia Chorda should have been tried long ago for what her predecessor Aspyce did. As you can see, it isn't difficult to find inconsistencies in a case if you use your head a little. I refuse to be a mindless tool and follow absurd orders."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人不该为前任行商浪人犯下的罪行负责。”{n}索罗蒙话音刚落，法庭中就爆发了阵阵窃窃私语，但索罗蒙不慌不忙，继续开了口。{/n}“否则，若是按照同样的逻辑，因森蒂娅·库尔达早就该为前任行商浪人阿斯拜丝的所作所为而接受审判了。正如你们所见，只要稍微动点脑子，就不难发现案件中的矛盾之处。我拒绝沦为没有头脑的工具，拒绝听从荒谬的命令。”

languages.text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente no debería responder por los delitos de su predecesora». {n}El público susurra, pero Solomorne continúa, impasible.{/n} «De ser así, Incendia Chorda debería haber sido juzgada hace mucho por los actos de su predecesora Aspyce. Como pueden ver, no es difícil encontrar inconsistencias en un casi si usan un poco la cabeza. Me niego a ser una herramienta mecánica para sus órdenes absurdas».
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader should not be held responsible for the misdeeds of {mf|his|her} predecessor." {n}Murmuring breaks out, but Solomorne presses on, unperturbed.{/n} "Or else, by that same logic, Incendia Chorda should have been tried long ago for what her predecessor Aspyce did. As you can see, it isn't difficult to find inconsistencies in a case if you use your head a little. I refuse to be a mindless tool and follow absurd orders."

traits.locale_text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente no debería responder por los delitos de su predecesora». {n}El público susurra, pero Solomorne continúa, impasible.{/n} «De ser así, Incendia Chorda debería haber sido juzgada hace mucho por los actos de su predecesora Aspyce. Como pueden ver, no es difícil encontrar inconsistencias en un casi si usan un poco la cabeza. Me niego a ser una herramienta mecánica para sus órdenes absurdas».

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーは前任者の不正行為の責任を負うべきではない」{n}ざわめきが起こったが、ソロモーンは動じずに続けた。{/n}「さもなければ、同じ理屈で言えば、インセンディア・チョーダは前任者アスパイスの行いでとっくに裁かれているはずだ。おわかりの通り、少し頭を使えば、この事件の矛盾点を見つけるのは難しくない。俺は愚かな道具となって、ばかげた命令に従うことを拒否する」
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader should not be held responsible for the misdeeds of {mf|his|her} predecessor." {n}Murmuring breaks out, but Solomorne presses on, unperturbed.{/n} "Or else, by that same logic, Incendia Chorda should have been tried long ago for what her predecessor Aspyce did. As you can see, it isn't difficult to find inconsistencies in a case if you use your head a little. I refuse to be a mindless tool and follow absurd orders."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーは前任者の不正行為の責任を負うべきではない」{n}ざわめきが起こったが、ソロモーンは動じずに続けた。{/n}「さもなければ、同じ理屈で言えば、インセンディア・チョーダは前任者アスパイスの行いでとっくに裁かれているはずだ。おわかりの通り、少し頭を使えば、この事件の矛盾点を見つけるのは難しくない。俺は愚かな道具となって、ばかげた命令に従うことを拒否する」

languages.text: "Hür Tacir, selefinin kabahatlerinden sorumlu tutulmamalıdır." {n}Homurtular yükseliyor ama Solomorne, istifini bozmadan devam ediyor.{/n} "Bu mantıkla, selefi Aspyce'nin yaptıkları yüzünden İncendia Chorda'nın da yargılanması gerekirdi. Görüldüğü üzere, bir davanın tutarsızlığını anlamak için azıcık akıl yürütmek yeterli. Ben aklımı askıya almayı, bu abes emirlere uymayı reddediyorum."
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader should not be held responsible for the misdeeds of {mf|his|her} predecessor." {n}Murmuring breaks out, but Solomorne presses on, unperturbed.{/n} "Or else, by that same logic, Incendia Chorda should have been tried long ago for what her predecessor Aspyce did. As you can see, it isn't difficult to find inconsistencies in a case if you use your head a little. I refuse to be a mindless tool and follow absurd orders."

Görüldüğü üzere, bir davanın tutarsızlığını anlamak için azıcık akıl yürütmek yeterli. Ben aklımı askıya almayı, bu abes emirlere uymayı reddediyorum."
